fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Piano Juncker, appalti pubblici e concessioni, iva, ritardi di pagamento, patto di stabilità e crescita, efficienza energetica, rifiuti
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
A livello europeo l'ANCE è membro della FIEC - Federazione dell`Industria Europea delle costruzioni e dell`EIC - European International Contractors. 
 
A livello italiano è membro di CONFINDUSTRIA - Confederazione Generale del'Industria Italiana
